title: Ministry Of Sound XX Twenty Years 2011 [EAC - FLAC](oan)
description:
Ministry Of Sound XX Twenty Years 2011 [EAC - FLAC](oan)


[img]http://nimga.com/f/0mi3K.jpg[/img]


- 4CD collection, divided into the clubs most successful residencies
including Rulin, Trance Nation andplus a bonus disc of Chilled House.

- Stylish 'Clamshell' Box set with 4 individual slipcases.

- 20 page booklet full of photos and info... Included

2011 marks the year of a significant milestone for what has become one of the 
most powerful brands across the globe since the opening of its club in 1991. 
Ministry of Sound celebrates 20 Years of being at the forefront of dance music 
culture with this epic release.

This essential 4CD collection has been divided into the clubs most successful 
residencies that have seen millions of ravers alike descend across the worlds 
most recognised club over the past couple of decades.

Rulin takes you on soulful journey through some of the biggest house tracks to 
shape the clubbing scene featuring big room classics David Morales Needin U 
Ultra Nate Free and Bucketheads The Bomb.

Trance Nation gets those hands in the air for a spine tingling experience with 
tracks from Faithless, Paul Van Dyk and Darude plus loads more.

encapsulates the beginnings of what was to become one of the most successful 
genres in UK music with Double 99 Rip Groove Tina Moore Never Gonna Let You 
and Robin S Show Me Love

Finally we wind down with handpicked selection of the finest laid back beats of 
Chilled House.

Stuck for a Xmas gift this year, then look no further than an album that encapsulates 
everything that is great about music on 4 outstanding CDs!

This is Ministry of Sound 20 Years!
